thread.section_title: The Westin San Francisco Airport - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Millbrae, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great conference space
thread.title_full: Great conference space - Review of The Westin San Francisco Airport, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: AJCC1
title: Great conference space
text: This hotel is perfect for business meetings. It is within close proximity to the airport and offers a free airport shuttle as well as one to downtown Burlingame. The rooms are quite plain as are the meeting spaces but they are large and the team is amazing! The food is actually good for hotel food.
